#LOAD_PHARMACIES_DATA_PY

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from urllib.parse import unquote

access_key=mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('keylakehouse','s3-access-key')

secret_key =mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('keylakehouse','s3-secret-key')

spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration().set("fs.s3a.access.key", access_key)
spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration().set("fs.s3a.secret.key", secret_key)
spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration().set("fs.s3a.endpoint", "http://20.215.33.25:9000")
spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration().set("fs.s3a.path.style.access", "true")
spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration().set("fs.s3a.impl", "org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.S3AFileSystem")

from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.functions import input_file_name

# Ścieżka do DeltaTable z listą przetworzonych plików
processed_files_path = "abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Pharmacies/Processed_Files_Logs"

try:
    processed_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(processed_files_path)
    print("Załadowano istniejący plik Delta z przetworzonymi plikami.")
except AnalysisException:
   processed_df = spark.createDataFrame([], "filepaths STRING")
   print("Plik Delta nie istnieje. Tworzony nowy pusty DataFrame.")



# Parametry MinIO
bucket_name = "pharmacies"
folder_path = "data/country=*/closed_month=*/"

# Wczytanie wszystkich plików CSV z MinIO (z subfolderami)
files_metadata = spark.read \
    .option("header", "true") \
    .csv(f"s3a://{bucket_name}/{folder_path}*") \
    .withColumn("input_file", input_file_name())

# Wyciągnięcie nazw plików
all_files = files_metadata.select("input_file").rdd.flatMap(lambda x: x).collect()

all_filenames = [file.split("/")[-1] for file in all_files]
all_paths = list(set([file.split(",")[-1] for file in all_files]))

# Lista już przetworzonych plików
processed_filenames = [row.filepaths for row in processed_df.collect()]

# Wyszukanie nowych plików do przetworzenia
new_paths = [paths for paths in all_paths if  unquote(paths) not in processed_filenames]

print(f"Znaleziono {len(new_paths)} nowych sciezek do przetworzenia.")

# Przetwarzanie nowych plików
for path in new_paths:
    file_path = path
    file_path= file_path.split("?")[0]
    print(file_path)
    file_name = [part for part in file_path.split("/") if "closed_month=" in part][0].split("=")[1] #file_path.split("/")[-1]
    country_name = [segment for segment in file_path.split("/") if segment.startswith("country=")][0].split("=")[1]
    print(f"Wczytywanie sciezki: {file_path}")
    print(f"Wczytywanie pliku: {file_name}")
    print(f"Wczytywanie sciezki: {country_name}")

    target_path = f"abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/MinIo_Pharmacies/{country_name}/{file_name}"


    print(f" Wczytywanie pliku: {file_path}")

    try:
        df_new = spark.read.option("header", "true").csv(unquote(file_path))
        df_new.write.mode("overwrite").csv(unquote(target_path))
        print(f"Zapisano plik do ADLS: {target_path}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Błąd podczas przetwarzania pliku {file_path}: {e}")

# Aktualizacja listy przetworzonych plików
if new_paths:
    new_files_df = spark.createDataFrame([(unquote(path),) for path in new_paths], ["pathname"])
    processed_files_updated = processed_df.union(new_files_df)
    processed_files_updated.show()
    # Zapis zaktualizowanej listy w formacie Delta
    processed_files_updated.write.format("delta") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
       .save(processed_files_path)

    print(f"Zaktualizowano {processed_files_updated.count()} listę przetworzonych plików w Delta.")
else:
    print("Brak nowych plików do przetworzenia.")
